properties.title: Le Moléson
properties.abstract: High above the medieval town of Gruyères is the iconic Mount Moléson. Its 2002-metrehigh summit offers spectacular panoramic views of Western Switzerland. Moléson - a mystical mountain!
properties.description:
A funicular and cable car take you to the top of the Moléson (2002 m).

The village of Moléson-sur-Gruyères, on the flanks of the Moléson, the prominent landmark of the Fribourg Pre-Alps, has transformed its slopes into a veritable leisure park: skis, bobsleds, Via Ferrata (via ferrata), cheese making in an alpine cheese dairy, family fun on the summer toboggan run or in the Devalkart. The via ferrata attracts mountaineers with a head for heights.
properties.name: Fribourg Region
